Intelligent Business Solutions
for the Humanitarian Community

AidIQ provides information management solutions to organisations in the humanitarian, development, disaster and emergency management sectors.

Contact us

Our Services

Business Analysis & Process Design

We work with you to identify your information management needs, and to design and implement effective business processes to meet those needs.

Software Development

We develop software solutions to support your business processes, made to measure for your organisation.

Deployment and Maintenance

We deploy SAHANA solutions, and perform any system administration, monitoring and maintenance tasks necessary to make sure the systems run smoothly at all times.

Support and Training

We provide key user support and training, as well as trainings for your in-house IT personnel in order to build the capacity needed to make the solutions sustainable while minimizing dependencies.
